Sql.CDATA: IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM SYS.views WHERE name = 'v_AllPOInTransit' AND SCHEMA_ID = SCHEMA_ID('dbo') ) DROP VIEW [dbo].[v_AllPOInTransit] GO CREATE VIEW v_AllPOInTransit AS SELECT [Company].[CompanyCD] AS 'TenantName', [POOrder].[OrderType], [POOrder].[OrderNbr], [POOrder].[Status], [POOrder].[OrderDate], [BAccount].[AcctName], [POOrder].[OrderDesc], [POOrder].[VendorRefNbr], [POOrder].[CuryID], [InventoryItem].[InventoryCD], [InventoryItem].[Descr], [POLine].[UOM], [POLine].[OrderQty], [POLine].[OpenQty], [Branch].[BranchCD], [POLine].[CuryUnitCost], [POOrder].[CreatedDateTime] FROM POOrder LEFT JOIN Company on Company.CompanyID = POOrder.CompanyID LEFT JOIN POLine on POLine.OrderType = POOrder.OrderType and POLine.OrderNbr = POOrder.OrderNbr and POLine.CompanyID = POOrder.CompanyID LEFT JOIN BAccount on BAccount.BAccountID = POOrder.VendorID and BAccount.CompanyID = POOrder.CompanyID LEFT JOIN InventoryItem on InventoryItem.InventoryID = POLine.InventoryID and InventoryItem.CompanyID = POLine.CompanyID LEFT JOIN Branch on Branch.BranchID = POOrder.BranchID and Branch.CompanyID = POOrder.CompanyID WHERE POOrder.CompanyID > 0
